meanings.definition: A transparent sheet of celluloid or similar material on which objects are drawn or painted for traditional animation.
meanings.sent1: The animator carefully placed the character on the cel to create the next frame.
meanings.sent2: The artist used multiple cels to bring the cartoon to life.
meanings.sent3: The cel seemed to come alive as the characters danced across its surface.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination soared as she painted on the magical cel.
meanings.sent5: The cel held the key to a world of animated wonders.

meanings.definition: A unit of luminous intensity equal to one candle per square meter.
meanings.sent1: The scientist measured the light using cels to determine its brightness.
meanings.sent2: The room was illuminated with cels to ensure proper visibility.
meanings.sent3: The cels in the lab made everything as bright as day, even at night.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like a thousand cels shining together.
meanings.sent5: The cels glowed softly, casting a warm light on the surroundings.
